activities: On-Line data and Human Resources Data, and third party data collected in on-demand/Saas/hosted systems/Technical Support
contacttitle1: Executive VP HR and Corporate Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: ASG will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of Personal Information and/or Employee Information in accordance with the principles contained in the ASG Safe Harbor Policy. For complaints that cannot be resolved between ASG and the complainant, ASG has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European data protection authorities (DPAs) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles and to cooperate and comply with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
